aecb_summary: 7 alerts: 5x Credit Card (3 with total AED 355k opened credit and 2 enquires with zero confirmed amounts), 2x Communications Service (unquantified amounts reported)

product_recommendations.justification: The client has five active alerts associated with credit card facilities, some involving opened credits of up to AED 355,000. With high lending capacity of AED 241,151.97 and a manageable DTI of 19.9%, restructuring these debt obligations into a personal consolidation loan would optimize their financial position and potentially reduce overall interest costs.

Agent_Recommends: The client enjoys a robust annual income of AED 1,200,000 with significant but manageable obligations and a prudent DTI of 19.9%, indicating a healthy financial standing. However, seven AECB alerts related to credit cards and communication services require attention, hinting at potential over-extension or unresolved queries. Recommended products are a FAB Credit Card Consolidation Loan to address card-related inquiries and a Personal Loan to support any additional liquidity needs effectively.
